title: Tvvo bookes of constancie. Written in Latine, by Iustus Lipsius. Containing, principallie, A comfortable conference, in common calamities. And will serue for a singular consolation to all that are priuately distressed, of afflicted, either in body or mind. Englished by Iohn Stradling, gentleman
author: Lipsius, Justus, 1547-1606.
publisher: By [P. Short for] Richard Iohnes, at the signe of the Rose and Crowne neere S. Andrewes Church in Holborn,
notes: A translation of: Iusti Lipsi de constantia libri duo.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
